content.text:
# 2006 Kingfisher Airlines Tennis Open – Singles

Dmitry Tursunov
| runner   =  Tomáš Berdych
| score    = 6–3, 4–6, 7–6(7–5)
| type     = singles doubles
| before_name = Ho Chi Minh City Open
| draw     = 32 (3/4)
| seeds    = 8
}}
Dmitry Tursunov defeated Tomáš Berdych 6–3, 4–6, 7–6(7–5) to win the 2006 Kingfisher Airlines Tennis Open  singles event.
Seeds
A champion seed is indicated in bold text while text in italics indicates the round in which that seed was eliminated.
Tommy Robredo (semifinals)
#  Mario Ančić (quarterfinals)
#  Tomáš Berdych (final)
#  Dmitry Tursunov (champion)
#  Carlos Moyá (first round)
#  Björn Phau (quarterfinals)
#  Juan Mónaco (first round)
#  Wesley Moodie (second round)
}}
